name: If I Had More Time...
description:
FULL SCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE! (Bottom right icon)

A meteor is on a crash course to your city!!! Luckily you have a magical hourglass that can turn back time right before the impact. 

Collect powerups to increase your speed and movement so you can collect all 3 keys to open the door to safety.

WASD or arrow keys to move.

Spacebar to Jump and double jump

L Shift to dash

Made for the extra category in about 25 hours of work.

Programming and Design by Torban https://twitter.com/therstrum

Art by McKenna Marvin https://mckennamarvin.com
